name: Yeveto
description:
Arrow Keys for movement, Space Bar for dash. 360 controller uses the d-pad and A button.

Yeveto was made for the Bmore Indie Games "Play The Music" game jam. In it, many Baltimore musicians donated music tracks, we split into teams, chose a song that moved us, and made games about those songs. Our entry was for a song by Yeveto called "Muscle Confusion". This is the result.

CREDITS: Dave Freeman (Jellybit) and Brian White both did everything. Music by Yeveto.
